title: Standard AD jg rune page.
body: I just got a couple additional rune pages and I want to make a standard jg page that would be efficient for  ad jg champs. What runes should I be looking into?

replies.body:
8 x AD Marks
1 x Crit Chance Mark

9 x Armor Seals

9 x Scaling MR Glyphs

2 x AD Quints
1 x Attack Speed Quint

Coming from a jungle main

Same runes most AD laners take.

**AD Marks, Armour Seals, MR or CDR Glyphs and AD Quints**

Some AD junglers like Attack Speed Quints instead. (like Xin Zhao, Nocturne etc)

Some people on attack speed junglers use 8 AD marks, 1 AS mark, 2 AS Quints and 1 AD Quint.

cdr/as/scaling mr glyphs

as/armor/scaling ar seal

as/ad/arp marks

quints should by hyper personalised. mobility is king stat of moba
depends on who i run atk spe quints, and 8 flat ad marks 1 crit, flat armor,4% cdr and 5 mr as xin works well on pan rek and rengar I just run flat ad mr and ar works fine
